item.description: In the previous articles of this advent series, we described the architecture of our search engine and highlighted technologies which help us serve search results. After many iterations on our architecture, we are finally on a microservice architecture pattern, driven through a container orchestration platform: Kubernetes. This brought us many engineering improvements, but it also has introduced new challenges, such as, the ability to perform a dataset propogation via Pub-Sub, along with volume management for microservices.
